reviewText:
Well.. my idllemaster ♥♥♥♥ed up somehow and gave me 1 achievement before I even install the game.. so i figure.. what the heck.. let's give it a try...

this is a risk type of battle chess game between USA and Germany.. Germany start with better less location but heavier and more dense units. While usa have more areas and cities to get more cards...

Germany have to have certain number of mech unit acress to the usa defense line before 15 turns is up...

Over all.. it's well thought out and well planned battle chess with a lot intersting randomness and fun cards to use. The graphics is decent and music is .. well.. repeating war song that I don't hate..

2 games later.. i do enjoy this a bit.. but this game have issues which make me turn my review into negative for now..

1. AI.. well AI is not too smart.. AI units charge your defense position with impossible odds instead of waiting it out.. and don't defense strategicly... don't use a lot of cards.. it must be improved else human win every games.

2. Bugs.. yes.. many many bugs still left in this game...

I once drag a reenforce unit to play in chess region but it got stuck in mid air and won't move.. blocks the center of my screen and it's not return to the starting location... i can no longer click it to move it. even after i click turn end. There is also one time.

I use the card join attack to attack from 2 location, while the computer ask me to select two location. I clicked to use another card to negate one famous general ability... Which cause neither of cards goes into effect. And i am stuck that clicking nothing works on the screen. i cannot even click turn end.

Above are the two major one I have met after 3.5 hours of play...

As it's current status.. i cannot recommend it right now.

May come back to it if this game gets it's bugs fixxed so i will work on rest of my achievements.

6.5/10 for now.. if it's bug free i would give it a 7.5 .. and yes.. not recommended to play right now.. avoid until bugs are fixed. I have made it thumb up right now so it would improve the rate of approval for now since it's not that bad of a game...

reviewText:
i'm on my 3rd game. first 2 were the north scenario. read the rules. interface is effecient. game is fun.

first game played as US. lost mainly because i didn't draw any unit cards. i had a lot of event type cards.
traffic jam, blow bridges etc. but didn't draw many units.

second game also as US. got some units and blew 2 bridges. caused some traffic jams and had an easy
time winning.

a lot of  strategy, decisions.  so far so good. playing US south now.

reviewText:
Hi there,

I brought this game on Steam and on Google play (Android).

I like card type war games and thought this could be good.

In its concept this is good idea and actually well thought out.

But the execution is severely flawed.

The game literally crashes in the latter stages leaving you fuming waiting to execute your game changing move that never comes.

It doesn't even matter which side you play on (I had played both thinking it was a glitch).

It is a late stage event that ultimately ruins the game.

Wasted my time and money on it.

Avoid like the plague until someone cares enough to finish it properly.
